tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE emergency_contacts (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
  relation VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE emergency_contacts (
    contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE individuals (
    individual_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    medical_conditions VARCHAR(200),
    emergency_contact_id INT REFERENCES emergency_contacts(contact_id)
);

CREATE TABLE distress_areas (
    area_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    area_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    emergency_services_available BOOLEAN,
    nearby_hospital VARCHAR(100),
    population_density INT
);

CREATE TABLE emergency_contacts (
  contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(50),
  address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE individuals (
  individual_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender CHAR(1),
  emergency_contact_id INT REFERENCES emergency_contacts(contact_id)
);

CREATE TABLE emergency_contacts (
  contact_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(50),
  address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE assistance_requests (
  request_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  individual_id UUID,
  area_id UUID,
  request_timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
  status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE assistance_responses (
  response_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  request_id UUID,
  responder_id UUID,
  response_timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now(),
  details TEXT
);
